# frankensteinR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of frankensteinR is to make the creation of a living meta-analysis quick and easy. It enables you to set up a quarto website to host you meta-analysis, report methods/protocols, share data, and enable others to contribute.

## Installation

You can install the development version of frankensteinR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("jamessteeleii/frankensteinR")
```
